plot: After undergoing a throat operation, Sach discovers that he now possesses a beautiful singing voice. Slip and the gang try to figure out ways to make money off of it.
title: Blues Busters
plot_es: After undergoing a throat operation, Sach discovers that he now possesses a beautiful singing voice. Slip and the gang try to figure out ways to make money off of it.
plot_en: After undergoing a throat operation, Sach discovers that he now possesses a beautiful singing voice. Slip and the gang try to figure out ways to make money off of it.

cast.role: Horace DeBussy 'Sach' Jones, aka The Bowery Thrush
cast.name: Huntz Hall
